Tag_Imageneed.description: ''[[The Fate of Atlantis | Assassin's Creed: Odyssey — The Fate of Atlantis]]''

MemoryInfobox.description: 'If Poseidon was right, the Keeper's Insights in Atlantis were the most potent sources of Isu Knowledge. Once Kassandra absorbed their power, the Staff of Hermes Trismegistus|Staff would be mastered, and Aletheia's trials would be complete. The journey was coming to its end.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' – 'The Fate of Atlantis: Judgment of Atlantis'
MemoryInfobox.next: Good From Far, Far From Good

General_Description: '''A Complete Education''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra set out to find the three [[Keeper's Insight]]s in [[Atlantis]].
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found all three Keeper's Insight's and increased her knowledge using them.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' – ''[[The Fate of Atlantis: Judgment of Atlantis]]''
